body_html: I've written this before, but I also think that using dim=1 as the default is a mistake, since it doesn't generalize well to n-dimensions and doesn't work on 1-D arrays. I don't think we should be baking in assumptions about data layout where we don't need to (i.e. that 3D is temporal with batch x channel x time).

body: I've written this before, but I also think that using `dim=1` as the default is a mistake, since it doesn't generalize well to n-dimensions and doesn't work on 1-D arrays. I don't think we should be baking in assumptions about data layout where we don't need to (i.e. that 3D is temporal with `batch x channel x time`).
